mapper.sql: id, name, code, target, allow, type, module_id, create_user_id, gmt_created, gmt_modified
mapper.select: select from permission where target = #{target} limit 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into permission (name, code, target, allow, type, module_id, create_user_id, gmt_created, gmt_modified) VALUES(#{name},#{code},#{target},#{allow},#{type},#{moduleId},#{createUserId},now(),now())
mapper.select: select p.id, p.name, p.code, p.target, p.allow, p.type, p.module_id, p.create_user_id, p.gmt_created, p.gmt_modified from permission p, role_permission rp where rp.permission_id = p.id and rp.role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.update: UPDATE permission set name = #{name}, code = #{code}, target = #{target}, allow=#{allow}, type=#{type}, module_id=#{moduleId}, gmt_modified = now() where id=#{id}
